divs: sighting detailsits becoming a familiar expereince- this being the third time, about annually ( oct 28 2009, oct 29 2010 ) that i have observed cloud\ contrail like objects in teh sky that do not follow natural or manmade rules that i know of. tonight, it was a cloud, with a very long "tail" that traveled steadily west, while the wind and all other clouds in the sky blew east. it passed right over my head, and didn't look to be much higher than the ordinary cumulous clouds below it. i'll attach some of the video i shot that i put up on the internet
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kailua
There were no other sightings in Kailua on or around October 9th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: reoccuring unnatural cloud / contrail formations/ movements
